page.title: 12SURVEY 2 HOMES & FOOD
page.content: 90% of those surveyed had central heating Radios 80% had more than 3 T.V.s 59% had 2 sets.30% of those surveyed have 1 telephone 52% have 2 and 18% have more. Video 46%,dishwasher 50%,freezer 87%,music centre 80% microwave 27%,washing machine 93%,computer 63% fridge 100%,tumble dryer 66%,garden 100%garage 66%double glazing 53%,greenhouse 23%,cleaning lady 23%. 7% did not have a car.52% had 1,31% 2,10% 3.{FOOD.}85% do not have cooked breakfast.47% eat cereal,62% toast.88% eat roast meat on Sundays,26% drink wine at mealtimes.94% of meals cooked by the woman.Popular meals,meat 59% Continental 18% fish 6%.Popular drinks,tea 65%,coffee 26%,spirits 6%.Most people eat 3 meals each day 65%.{SHOPPING.}The weekly food shoppimgis done in Hertford 94%.
